m_szDocTitle: Sierra Nevada challenges NASA 'space taxi' contracts to Boeing, SpaceX | Reuters
m_szDocSumamry: Sierra Nevada challenges NASA 'space taxi' contracts to Boeing, SpaceX WASHINGTON An interior view of Boeing's CST-100 spacecraft, which features LED lighting and tablet technology, is seen in an undated NASA handout image. Reuters/NASA/Robert Markowitz/Handout WASHINGTON Sierra Nevada Corp (SNC) said it had filed a legal challenge to NASA's award of contracts totaling $6.8 billion to Boeing and SpaceX to build commercially owned and operated "space taxis" to fly astronauts to the International Space Station.
